dealGame

public void dealGame()
              throws DealException,
                     ListFullException,
                     ListEmptyException,
                     IndexInvalidException
Deals the cards to the six select stacks then to the discard pile.
Throws:
DealException - If there is a Problem with the deal

doUserMove

public void doUserMove(int stackNum)
                throws ListFullException,
                       ListEmptyException
Carries out the selected move if it is allowd. Accepts an int for the Stack number. 0 is the first stack in the array, 5 is the last. 6 is the turn pile Returns a boolean value to say weather the move was successfull or not.
Parameters:
the - number value of the move

Checks to see if the value of the chosen card is valid for the move.
Parameters:
int - theValue The value of the chosen Card.
Returns:
true if the move is valid.
